actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 405 of title 37, United States Code, to delay for a period of at least 30 days the effective date of any reduction in the cost-of-living allowance authorized by the Secretary concerned under such section for members of the uniformed services serving at certain duty stations outside the United States or in Alaska or Hawaii.

summary.text: Provides for the delaying for a period of at least thirty days the effective date of any reduction in the cost-of-living allowance authorized by the Secretary of the military department concerned for members of the uniformed services serving at duty stations outside the United States or in Alaska or Hawaii. (Amends 37 U.S.C. 405)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 405 of title 37, United States Code, to delay for a period of at least 30 days the effective date of any reduction in the cost-of-living allowance authorized by the Secretary concerned under such section for members of the uniformed services serving at certain duty stations outside the United States or in Alaska or Hawaii.
